DOC.brief_summary: The aim study explore effect substitution out-of-hours primary care . In consecutive stage extra General Practitioner ( GP ) substitute Nurse Practitioner ( NP ) aim replace 3 4 GPs NPs . Effects measure term feasibility cost-efficiency .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Substitution Out-of-hours Care From General Practitioners Nurse Practitioners
DOC.detailed_description: Out-of-hours care Netherlands pressure . Workload GPs out-of-hours care high concern maintain quality care . Since 80 % complaint show out-of-hours care neither complex urgent patient necessarily see GP . A previous study ( ID : 80-82800-98-227 ) indicate shift care GPs NPs possible term safety quality care result cost saving due less treatment . In study 4 GPs 1 NP provide care experimental condition 5 GPs provide care control condition . Based result hypothesize NPs competent diagnose treat least 75 % complaint show out-of-hours primary care . Substituting GPs NPs out-of-hours care probably lead cost saving . In current study care deliver direct healthcare cost compare different team composition . In experimental condition care provide team NPs GPs . The intervention start team 4 professional experimental ( 3 GPs 1 NP ) control ( 4 GPs ) condition ; consecutive stage extra GP substitute NP aim replace 3 4 GPs NPs . Control : 4 GPs Stage 1 : experimental : 3 GPs & 1 NP Stage 2 : experimental : 2 GPs & 2 NPs Stage 3 : experimental : 1 GP & 3 NPs Both feasibility cost-efficiency lead recommendation optimal balance team GPs NPs .
DOC.criteria: Patients ( urgencylevel U2 , U3 , U4 , U5 ) request appointment primary outofhours service weekend 10am 6pm .
